summary: In this conversation, the customer was looking for help setting up their new Contoso Wireless TV. The agent provided assistance with connecting the TV to their home Wi-Fi network, as well as information about how to purchase additional content for the TV. The agent also provided important information about what cables and adapters were needed for the connection and suggested that the customer read through the user manual that came with the TV. Finally, the agent offered further assistance should the customer need it.
